languages.text: "Я... Я просто мечтала быть достойной слугой Императора. Вершить Его волю, наказывать Его врагов. Превратить эту скверную и убогую систему в обитель, достойную света Его и не унижающую величия Его".

"I... I only dreamt of being a worthy servant of the Emperor: of doing His will; of punishing His enemies; of turning this corrupt and decrepit system into a place that is worthy of His light and does not diminish His greatness."
languages.original_text: "Я... Я просто мечтала быть достойной слугой Императора. Вершить Его волю, наказывать Его врагов. Превратить эту скверную и убогую систему в обитель, достойную света Его и не унижающую величия Его".

traits.locale_text: "I— I only dreamt of being a worthy servant of the Emperor. Of doing His will; of punishing His enemies. Of turning this corrupt and decrepit system into an abode that is worthy of His light and does not diminish His greatness."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "I— I only dreamt of being a worthy servant of the Emperor. Of doing His will; of punishing His enemies. Of turning this corrupt and decrepit system into an abode that is worthy of His light and does not diminish His greatness."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "I... I only dreamt of being a worthy servant of the Emperor: of doing His will; of punishing His enemies; of turning this corrupt and decrepit system into a place that is worthy of His light and does not diminish His greatness."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “我……我只是想成为帝皇优秀的仆人，想执行祂的旨意，惩罚祂的敌人。我只是想把这座腐朽、邪恶的星站变成一座伟大的居所，无愧于祂的光辉，无愧于祂的伟大。”
languages.original_text: "I... I only dreamt of being a worthy servant of the Emperor: of doing His will; of punishing His enemies; of turning this corrupt and decrepit system into a place that is worthy of His light and does not diminish His greatness."

traits.locale_text: “我……我只是想成为帝皇优秀的仆人，想执行祂的旨意，惩罚祂的敌人。我只是想把这座腐朽、邪恶的星站变成一座伟大的居所，无愧于祂的光辉，无愧于祂的伟大。”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「私は…私はただ、皇帝の立派な信奉者になりたかっただけなのだ。皇帝の意思である、主の敵を罰する事だけを考えてきた。そして、この腐敗し老朽化した世の中を、主の光にふさわしい主の偉大さを損なうことのない場所に変えること。それだけが目標だった」
languages.original_text: "I... I only dreamt of being a worthy servant of the Emperor: of doing His will; of punishing His enemies; of turning this corrupt and decrepit system into a place that is worthy of His light and does not diminish His greatness."

traits.locale_text: 「私は…私はただ、皇帝の立派な信奉者になりたかっただけなのだ。皇帝の意思である、主の敵を罰する事だけを考えてきた。そして、この腐敗し老朽化した世の中を、主の光にふさわしい主の偉大さを損なうことのない場所に変えること。それだけが目標だった」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «Yo... solo soñaba con servir dignamente al Emperador: hacer Su voluntad, castigar a Sus enemigos, convertir este sistema corrupto en un lugar digno de Su luz que no mancillara Su grandeza».
languages.original_text: "I... I only dreamt of being a worthy servant of the Emperor: of doing His will; of punishing His enemies; of turning this corrupt and decrepit system into a place that is worthy of His light and does not diminish His greatness."

traits.locale_text: «Yo... solo soñaba con servir dignamente al Emperador, hacer Su voluntad, castigar a Sus enemigos, convertir este sistema corrupto en una morada digna de Su luz que no hiciera pequeña Su grandeza».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Ich ... Ich habe immer nur davon geträumt eine würdige Dienerin des Imperators zu sein. Seinen Willen zu wirken. Seine Feinde zu bestrafen. Dieses korrupte und verkommende System in eine Stätte zu verwandeln, die seines Lichts würdig ist und seine Erhabenheit nicht herabsetzt."
languages.original_text: "I... I only dreamt of being a worthy servant of the Emperor: of doing His will; of punishing His enemies; of turning this corrupt and decrepit system into a place that is worthy of His light and does not diminish His greatness."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... Ich habe immer nur davon geträumt eine würdige Dienerin des Imperators zu sein. Seinen Willen zu wirken. Seine Feinde zu bestrafen. Dieses korrupte und verkommende System in eine Stätte zu verwandeln, die seines Lichts würdig ist und seine Erhabenheit nicht herabsetzt."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Je... Je ne rêvais que d'être une digne servante de l'Empereur, d'accomplir Sa volonté, de châtier Ses ennemis... de changer ce système pathétique et corrompu en un domaine qui soit digne de Sa lumière et qui n'amoindrisse pas Sa grandeur. »
languages.original_text: "I... I only dreamt of being a worthy servant of the Emperor: of doing His will; of punishing His enemies; of turning this corrupt and decrepit system into a place that is worthy of His light and does not diminish His greatness."

traits.locale_text: « Je... Je ne rêvais que d'être une digne servante de l'Empereur, d'accomplir Sa volonté, de châtier Ses ennemis... de changer ce système pathétique et corrompu en un domaine qui soit digne de Sa lumière et qui n'amoindrisse pas Sa grandeur. »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Ben... Ben yalnızca İmparator'a layık bir hizmetkâr olmanın hayalini kurdum. O'nun iradesince hareket etmek, O'nun düşmanlarını cezalandırmak, bu yozlaşmış ve dermanı kalmamış sistemi O'nun ışığına layık bir yere dönüştürmek ve O'nun azametinin asla azalmamasını sağlamak istedim..."
languages.original_text: "I... I only dreamt of being a worthy servant of the Emperor: of doing His will; of punishing His enemies; of turning this corrupt and decrepit system into a place that is worthy of His light and does not diminish His greatness."

traits.locale_text: "Ben... Ben yalnızca İmparator'a layık bir hizmetkâr olmanın hayalini kurmuşumdur. O'nun iradesince hareket etmek, O'nun düşmanlarını cezalandırmak, bu yozlaşmış ve dermanı kalmamış sistemi O'nun ışığına layık bir yere dönüştürmek ve O'nun azametinin asla azalmamasını sağlamak..."
traits.speaker: Chorda
